SECTION__TAGS__gameintro: 1132||||Cheeky Monkeys is a 5-reel, 3-row, 10 line video slot featuring Free Spins x5, Interacting Symbols, Multiplier x5 and Bonus Reel.

SECTION__TAGS__general003: 3||||This game has a fixed number of $LINESTEPS_MAX paylines, you can not change the number of your active paylines.
SECTION__TAGS__general004: 2||||Changing the bet amount automatically changes the win amounts displayed in the paytable, those amounts are displayed in the currency you selected.
SECTION__TAGS__general018: 1000||||When 3 or more identical matching symbols appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__general010: 9||||Only the highest win on an active payline will be paid.
SECTION__TAGS__general011: 10||||If you have more than one win on a single spin, the total amount of your winnings are added together and displayed in the win field and added to your balance.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons003: 14||||Click to activate all paylines and the highest possible bet amount.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons004: 15||||Click to access the autoplay settings menu to configure your autoplay. Once autoplay is on, it can be stopped at any moment by pressing this button.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons007: 18||||Click to display the paytable and paylines.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons014: 25||||Click to toggle between turning the music or ambient sounds on and off.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons015: 26||||Click to toggle between turning the sound effects on and off.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons012: 11||||Click to activate or deactivate Quickspin. When activated the spin speed will increase.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons018: 29||||Click to return to the game board.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons020: 184||||Click to view player history. Includes timestamps, game titles, session IDs, rounds, currencies, languages, variants and screenshots of results.
SECTION__TAGS__fields004: 34||||Displays the total win. It will be displayed until the reels in the following spin stop.
SECTION__TAGS__fields009: 39||||Displays the total bet. The total bet is the result of the amount bet per line multiplied by the quantity of active paylines.
SECTION__TAGS__fields012: 42||||Displays the total amount available to wager.
SECTION__TAGS__fields014: 44||||Displays the number of spins for auto spins. This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__fields027: 198||||Displays the number of lines for auto spins.
SECTION__TAGS__fields018: 48||||Displays the bet per line for auto spins.This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__wild045: 1102||||The Wild symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter and Interacting Symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__scatter001: 276||||The Scatter symbol does not have a payout.
SECTION__TAGS__scatter004: 1112||||The Scatter symbol appears only in the Bonus Reel.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins037: 1107||||3 Scatter symbols in the Bonus Reel trigger 5 Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins038: 1108||||During Free Spins all your winnings are multiplied by 5.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins039: 1109||||During Free Spins further single Free Spins can only be acquired by getting the Scatter +1 symbol in the Bonus Reel. This has no payout value but will award 1 additional Free Spin.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins005: 104||||The number of your current Free Spins is always shown in the Free Spin counter, which is displayed during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins006: 105||||After all your Free Spins have finished a banner will display your total winnings achieved during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins017: 257||||During Free Spins, the bet amount cannot be changed.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins015: 235||||Free Spins cannot be re-triggered during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__bonusreel001: 1110||||The Bonus Reel is the last reel of the game.
SECTION__TAGS__bonusreel002: 1111||||The Bonus Reel is comprised of Multiplier x5, Scatters and Interacting Symbols
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym001: 118||||If two different Interacting Symbols land side by side anywhere on the game board they will perform an interacting animation and a special win will be awarded.
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym005: 1113||||Interacting Symbols award 10 times the total bet during the base game and 50 times the total bet during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym006: 1114||||Interacting Symbols can only appear in reel 5 and the Bonus Reel.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym009: 1115||||Multiplier x5 symbols appear only on the Bonus Reel.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym012: 1118||||Wins obtained on active paylines containing the Multiplier x5 symbol are multiplied by 5.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym010: 1116||||When the Multiplier x5 helps form a win, the payout is the result of this multiplication.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym011: 1117||||The Multiplier x5 symbol can substitute for all symbols except the Scatter symbol to help form payline wins but not to help trigger a feature.
SECTION__TAGS__terms001: 141||||This game automatically logs you out after 10 minutes of inactivity. This is a security measure to protect you. Just log back in and you will continue where you left off.
SECTION__TAGS__terms002: 142||||If a disconnection from the game or a malfunction of the game occurs, when the player logs back into the game, the player's balance returns to its last full amount before the interruption occurred.
SECTION__TAGS__terms003: 143||||In the event of a dispute, or if the balance has not readjusted to its last amount after a certain amount of days, the issue will be resolved through communication with the operator's technical support team.
SECTION__TAGS__terms004: 144||||In the event of a malfunction, all affected game bets and payouts are rendered void and all affected bets refunded.
SECTION__TAGS__terms005: 178||||The theoretical return to player for this game is $RTP $PERCENT
SECTION__TAGS__terms006: 170||||In this game you can win up to a maximum of 500,000 RSD.

SECTION__TAGS__glossary001: 145||||Note: The following table is only applicable if you are playing in a language other than English.
MSG_FSPIN_WON_MORE: 10 more free spins await you in the next level
LBL_EXP_CHOOSE: You have won 10 free spins! With this expanding symbol
LBL_RULES_SCATTER_DESC: Free Spins triggered by 3 Scatter Symbols
LBL_RULES_WILD_DESC: Substitutes for all symbols except the Scatter Symbol
LBL_RULES_SPECIAL1_DESC: The 6th reel is comprised of Free Spin Scatters, +1 Free Spin Scatters, Multiplier x5 and Interacting Symbols
LBL_GAMBLE_CHOOSE: Choose one of the two for a chance to double your winnings
LBL_DOUBLE_DESC: is The Doubler, and awards double the win amount displayed
LBL_WIN_ALL_DESC: is the Win-All, and awards you all 10 win amounts displayed
LBL_RULES_WILD_DESC_2: Can substitute any other symbols except "Scatter"  and "Special"
LBL_RULES_SPECIAL2_DESC: Trigger the Interacting Symbols to win 10 times your bet
LBL_RULES_WILD_DESC2: Can substitute any other symbols except "Scatter"  and "Special"
LBL_RULES_SPECIAL3_DESC: Rotator feature triggered by 1 Special Symbols or more
LBL_RULES_WILD_DESC_3: Substitutes for all other symbols in matches formed of identical symbols
LBL_BS_LAST_SPIN: This is your last free Bonus Spin!
LBL_FSPIN_LM_EXTRA_IN_LV1: 8 more Free Spins await you in Level 2
LBL_FSPIN_LM_EXTRA_IN_LV2: 8 more Free Spins await you in Level 3
LBL_FSPIN_LM_EXTRA_IN_LV3: 8 more Free Spins await you in Level 3
SECTION__TAGS__fields016: 46||||Displays the number of lines for auto spins. This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay017: 193||||Getting 3 Scatter symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay immediately gets you 10 Free Spins, during which your 2-Way Pay Spins are put on hold.
SECTION__TAGS__wild012: 66||||Wins obtained on active paylines including a Wild x2 symbol are doubled.
SECTION__TAGS__permatwowaypay003: 133||||As an exception, paylines with all symbols of the same kind only pay once.
SECTION__TAGS__wild036: 246||||If a winning combination contains more than one Wild x3 symbol, the multiplier values will be added.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedsym006: 297||||Major Symbols are stacked in sets of 2 or 3, which can appear partially or completely on the reels.
SECTION__TAGS__wild041: 275||||The Wild symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, to trigger Free Spin.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay021: 234||||If you get 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during Free Spins, 5 additional 2-Way Pay spins are added to your current 2 Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplierreel001: 434||||The Multiplier Reel is comprised of Mystery Multiplier symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble002: 109||||In the Gamble feature, you will see the amount of your last win displayed as ‘Current Win’ and you will see the amount you can win displayed as ‘Possible Win’.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym003: 95||||When 3 or more Expanding Symbols appear on at least 3 different reels, the Expanding Symbols will expand vertically over the entire reel.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins035: 1019||||5 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 20 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__general015: 272||||The values displayed in the paytable for payline wins are the amounts that the bet per line is multiplied by with a win, they are static and do not change.
SECTION__TAGS__wildreel005: 1002||||All the symbols that can appear on reels 1 and 5 are Wild symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__general009: 8||||When different symbols are grouped together in the paytable because they offer the same win amounts, this does not mean that combinations of those symbols count as wins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins021: 293||||During Major Free Spins, the bet amount cannot be changed.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym005: 281||||The Multiplier x8 symbol can substitute for all symbols except the Scatter symbol to help form payline wins but not to help trigger a feature.
SECTION__TAGS__general012: 212||||When identical matching symbol appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right, top to bottom or bottom to top, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__wild023: 199||||The Wild symbol does not substitute for Special symbols, in terms of payouts or Rotator triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay019: 232||||For the next 5 spins winnings are counted on active paylines from both left to right, and right to left. Getting matching symbols in a row on an active payline across all reels is counted both ways.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay011: 84||||If you get 4 or more Special symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay, 10 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__mixnmatch003: 123||||See paytable for visual representation of winning combinations.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay025: 255||||Getting 3 Scatter symbols during 2-Way Pay immediately gets you 10 Free Spins, during which your 2-Way Pay Spins are put on hold.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons011: 22||||Click to be taken to the Gamble. Can only be selected when highlighted.
SECTION__TAGS__fields024: 54||||Displays the win achieved in standard play before Gamble.
SECTION__TAGS__wild014: 68||||If a win is formed only by Wild x2 symbols no multiplication will be applied but a special payout will be awarded.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay023: 253||||If you get 3 or more Special symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay, 5 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__mixnmatch002: 122||||Payouts are calculated by the ‘Bet Per Line’ being multiplied by the values displayed on the paytable.
SECTION__TAGS__wild028: 238||||Will appear only in the base game, not during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay030: 310||||If you get 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay, 5 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym007: 99||||In case your connection is lost during the random selection of the Expanding Symbol before you have hit stop, when you return one symbol will have been randomly chosen automatically to be the Expanding Symbol and then your Free Spins will begin.
SECTION__TAGS__wild040: 271||||Substitutes for all other symbols, except the Scatter symbol, in matches formed of identical symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons008: 19||||Click to display the paylines and rules.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym002: 94||||Before Free Spins begin, hit stop to randomly designate which symbol will be the Expanding Symbol for the Free Spins, excluding Wild, Scatter and Special symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__permatwowaypay002: 132||||All active paylines pay, from left to right and from right to left.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplyingwilds001: 128||||This game has Wild symbols which have multiplying values displayed upon them.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay028: 289||||If you get 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay, 8 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__doublesym003: 92||||With 5 matching Double Symbols, the payout would be equivalent to 10 matching single symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons033: 1088||||Tap to go back to the main game.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay013: 86||||3 or more Wild symbols anywhere on the game board activates the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator007: 207||||After 1 rotation, the Special symbol behaves like a Wild symbol until all the rotations are complete.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay003: 76||||During 2-Way Pay, you can decrease your bet or the number of active paylines, but you cannot increase them to higher than the level previously set when the 2-Way Pay spins were awarded.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins002: 101||||Free Spins can be re-triggered during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wild042: 415||||The Wild symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay031: 311||||Getting 3 Scatter symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay immediately gets you 5 Free Spins, during which your 2-Way Pay Spins are put on hold.
SECTION__TAGS__wild029: 239||||Will appear only in the base game.
SECTION__TAGS__wild002: 56||||2 Wild symbols upon active paylines will not substitute for a symbol that only needs to appear twice on active paylines for a win.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym002: 125||||Wins obtained on active paylines containing the Multiplier x7 symbol are multiplied by 7.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym004: 96||||Additional Free Spins can be achieved during Free Spins with 3 or more Scatter symbols and your Expanding Symbol will remain the same.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons032: 1087||||Change the bet size by the up and down arrows or by selecting a value directly.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin006: 298||||This feature occurs randomly and can award 10x, 25x or 100x the value of the total bet of the winning spin.
SECTION__TAGS__wild032: 242||||The Wild x2 symbol does not substitute for Special symbols, in terms of payouts or 2-Way Pay triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble009: 115||||You cannot access the Gamble feature during ‘Autoplay’ mode.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble001: 108||||With a win, you can select Gamble to be taken to a new screen to play a double-or-nothing round.
SECTION__TAGS__mysterywildreel004: 1014||||During the Major Free Spins, the Mystery Wild Reel can appear only on reel 3.
SECTION__TAGS__wild015: 157||||Wild x2 symbols can substitute for all other symbols including Scatter symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__wild039: 249||||The Wild x3 symbol does not substitute for the Special symbol, in terms of triggering the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplierreel004: 437||||This feature is active both in the base game and during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wild026: 211||||Multiplying Wild symbols will not appear during Free Spins
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin007: 299||||The winnings obtained from the Random Fiesta Award will be added to the winnings of the spin.
SECTION__TAGS__wild017: 70||||Wild x2 symbols substitute for Scatter symbol payouts.
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym004: 231||||Interacting Symbols award 5 times the total bet during the base game and 10 times the total bet during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplyingwilds005: 1120||||This game has Wild symbols which have a multiplying value of 5.
SECTION__TAGS__general008: 7||||When identical matching symbol appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right, right to left, top to bottom or bottom to top, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin001: 261||||This feature occurs randomly and can award 10x, 15x, 20x, 25x or 50x the value of the total bet of the winning spin.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins036: 999||||Major Free Spins can be re-triggered during Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator003: 203||||3 Special symbols trigger 2 rotations, 4 Special symbols trigger 3 rotations and 5 Special symbols trigger 4 rotations.
SECTION__TAGS__wild024: 209||||Wild symbols will not appear during Free Spins
SECTION__TAGS__freespins031: 423||||4 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 7 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedsym005: 286||||Major symbols are those with the highest payout, please see the paytable.
SECTION__TAGS__catpot002: 1123||||3 ‘Catpot’ symbols = stake x20 (available in the base game and in Free Spins)
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym003: 120||||An interacting scenario will never occur in a payline win formed of identical symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__special002: 251||||The Special symbol does not have a payout.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble010: 116||||If during the gamble your session is interrupted, upon reloading the session you will be returned to the slot screen with the winnings from your last spin added to your balance and you will not be able to hit ‘Gamble’.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym004: 127||||When the Multiplier x7 helps form a win, the payout is the result of this multiplication.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons013: 24||||Click here to be taken to the settings.
SECTION__TAGS__growingmajors002: 433||||In this game all character symbols are majors.
SECTION__TAGS__fields006: 36||||Displays the number of active paylines. This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedwilds001: 138||||Stacked Wilds are composed of Wild symbols in stacks of 3, which can appear partially or completely on reels.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins025: 312||||1 Scatter symbol on the game board triggers 3 Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__scatterxpay001: 266||||The Scatter symbol can appear anywhere in the game board.
SECTION__TAGS__growingmajors001: 432||||When an individual reel contains the same major symbol in each of the 3 reel positions, this symbol will visually expand to fill the reel with a single image of that symbol. Wins are paid according to the 3 individual symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__general006: 5||||When identical matching symbols appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__rotator009: 314||||After 1 rotation, the Special symbol will replace any other symbol to complete a payline win, until all the rotations are complete.
SECTION__TAGS__wild038: 248||||The Wild x2 symbol does not substitute for the Special symbol, in terms of triggering the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator008: 230||||3 Specials triggers 2 rotations. 4 Specials triggers 3 rotations.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay027: 280||||Getting 3 Scatter symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay immediately gets you 8 Free Spins, during which your 2-Way Pay Spins are put on hold.
SECTION__TAGS__wild031: 241||||The Wild x2 symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons036: 1090||||Set amount of spins without pressing the spin button each time. You can choose additional conditions for when to stop the autoplay.
SECTION__TAGS__mysterywildreel001: 1011||||The Mystery Wild Reel is comprised of stacked Mystery Multiplier symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__doublesym001: 90||||Double Symbols count as 2 occurrences of the corresponding single symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__wild009: 63||||Wins obtained on active paylines including any number of Wild x2 symbols are doubled once.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin002: 262||||The winnings obtained from the Random Win will be added to the winnings of the spin.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedsym004: 285||||Stacked Majors are composed of identical major symbols in stacks of 3, which can appear partially or completely on reels.

SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay029: 309||||For the next 5 spins winnings are counted on active paylines from both left to right, and right to left. Getting matching symbols in a row on an active payline across all reels is counted both ways.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay007: 80||||3 or more Special symbols anywhere on the game board activates the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons031: 1086||||Click to access the bet menu, if you click the bet display you also access the bet menu.
SECTION__TAGS__fields002: 32||||Displays the bet per active payline. This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__mysterywildreel002: 1012||||The range of Mystery Multipliers is as follows: 2x, 3x, 5x, or 10x.
SECTION__TAGS__mysterywildreel003: 1013||||During the base game, the Mystery Wild Reel can appear on any reel. A spin may contain up to 2 Mystery Wild Reel.
SECTION__TAGS__wild037: 247||||The Wild symbol does not substitute for the Special symbol, in terms of triggering the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__wild003: 57||||The Wild symbol substitutes for the Interacting Symbol when they form normal matches but it will not substitute to trigger the Interacting Symbol win.
SECTION__TAGS__general013: 229||||The symbols Scatter and Special award winnings when they appear anywhere in the gameboard.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble003: 110||||The ‘Current Win’ is the amount you will be gambling, and the ‘Possible Win’ is the amount that you can win, it is double the amount of the ‘Current Win’.
SECTION__TAGS__general002: 1||||Changing the bet amount or the number of paylines automatically changes the win amounts displayed in the paytable, those amounts are displayed in the currency you selected.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons024: 1079||||Click to access the Quick settings menu.
SECTION__TAGS__scatter002: 313||||The Scatter symbol appears only on reel number 3.
SECTION__TAGS__verticalpaylines002: 214||||Vertical lines 21, 23, 25, 27 and 29 pay from top downwards and vertical lines 22, 24, 26, 28 and 30 pay from the bottom upwards.

SECTION__TAGS__multiplyingwilds003: 130||||When a Multiplying Wild helps form a win, the payout is the result of this multiplication.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti005: 320||||During Level 2 Free Spins, every time 3 Scatter symbols appear, you win 8 more Free Spins in Level 3.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins026: 1103||||Achieve 3 or more Scatter symbols to acquire Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplierreel003: 436||||A multiplier is triggered if there is a payline win with 4 matching symbols. This win will be multiplied by the value of the multiplier on the final position of the winning line.
SECTION__TAGS__wild010: 64||||If a win is formed only by Wild x2 symbols, no multiplication will be applied.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins032: 424||||During Major Free Spins reels 1-4 will contain only Major symbols, Wilds and Scatters. Reel 5 is the Multiplier Reel.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin010: 306||||The winnings obtained from the Mystery Jackpot will be added to the winnings of the spin.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins016: 256||||3 Scatter symbols on the game board trigger 10 Free Spins.

SECTION__TAGS__freespins010: 191||||If you get 3 Scatter symbols during your Free Spins, you get 10 more Free Spins added to your current Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wild033: 243||||If a winning combination contains more than one Wild x2 symbol, the multiplier values will be added.
SECTION__TAGS__wild016: 69||||Wins obtained on active paylines including any number of Wild x2 symbols are doubled.

SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay014: 87||||If you get 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during 2-Way Pay, 10 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.

SECTION__TAGS__scatterxpay003: 268||||When 2 Scatter symbols appear they award a win of 7x the Total Bet.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins011: 192||||Getting 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during Free Spins gets you 2-Way Pay for 10 spins only after your Free Spins have ended.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble007: 113||||As long as you keep winning, you can keep gambling for $GAMBLES times in a row, or until your winnings reach $GAMBLE_MONEY_LIMIT.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay018: 200||||During 2-Way Pay, you can decrease your bet, but you cannot increase it to higher than the level previously set when the 2-Way Pay spins were awarded.
SECTION__TAGS__general005: 4||||The values displayed in the paytable are the amounts that the bet per line is multiplied by with a win, they are static and do not change.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons045: 1098||||Choose the language in which the game is displayed.
SECTION__TAGS__general016: 273||||The values displayed in the paytable for the Scatter symbol wins are the amounts that the total bet is multiplied by with a win, they are static and do not change.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti002: 317||||During Level 1 Free Spins, every time 3 Scatter symbols appear, you win 8 more Free Spins in Level 2.
SECTION__TAGS__permafourwaypay004: 137||||Only the highest win on active paylines will be paid.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble004: 111||||If you guess correctly you win double the ‘Current Win’ amount.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplierreel002: 435||||The range of Mystery Multipliers is as follows: 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 7x, 10x, 20x or 50x.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym006: 98||||The symbol selected as the Expanding Symbol will be displayed on the game board for the duration of the Expanding Symbol feature.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins024: 296||||After all your Major Free Spins have finished a banner will display your total winnings achieved during Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins030: 422||||3 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 3 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wild030: 240||||The Wild symbol does not substitute for Special symbols, in terms of payouts or 2-Way Pay triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble013: 189||||You can choose to Gamble after getting 3 Scatter symbols but you can not gamble winnings awarded during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons040: 1093||||Tap to go back to the main game, all autoplay settings will be rejected.
SECTION__TAGS__catpot006: 1127||||Catpot payouts are displayed on top of the reels and change dynamically according to the players stake.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay006: 79||||Only when all your Free Spins end, your remaining 2-Way Pay Spins resume.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay002: 75||||The total number of remaining 2-Way Pay spins is always displayed in the 2-Way Pay counter, which is shown for the duration of 2-Way Pay.
SECTION__TAGS__wild020: 73||||The Wild symbol does not substitute for Scatter symbols, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym006: 282||||Wins obtained on active paylines containing the Multiplier x8 symbol are multiplied by 8.
SECTION__TAGS__verticalpaylines004: 277||||Vertical lines 21, 22, 23, 24 and 25 pay from top downwards.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins020: 292||||3 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 10 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedsym001: 185||||Stacked Symbols are composed of identical symbols in stacks of 3, which can appear partially or completely on reels.
SECTION__TAGS__wild021: 196||||The Wild x3 symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__wildreel006: 1003||||The Fire Reel is active only during Major Free Spins
SECTION__TAGS__freespins027: 1104||||3 Scatter symbols will award 5 Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__verticalpaylines003: 215||||Wins obtained on any Vertical Multiplying Payline are multiplied by the multiplying value display upon them. For more details refer to the paylines page.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti001: 316||||3 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 8 Free Spins in Level 1.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins018: 290||||Getting 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during Free Spins gets you 2-Way Pay for 8 spins only after your Free Spins have ended.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator010: 315||||After 1 rotation, the Special symbol will replace any other symbol, except the Scatter, to complete a payline win, until all the rotations are complete.
SECTION__TAGS__wild004: 58||||The Wild symbol does not substitute for the Expanding Symbol after the expansion of the reels.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons025: 1080||||Click to start Autoplay to start 50 spins by default, without going to the settings menu.
SECTION__TAGS__permatwowaypay001: 131||||The Perma 2-Way Pay feature is always active; it does not need to be triggered.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti009: 324||||The number of current Free Spins is always shown in the Level Multiplier bar, which is displayed during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay010: 83||||4 or more Special symbols anywhere on the game board activates the 2-Way Pay feature.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin003: 263||||Random Win can be triggered only in the base game, not during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator001: 201||||When 2 or more Special symbols appear anywhere, the Rotator feature is triggered.
SECTION__TAGS__wild018: 71||||The Wild symbols substitute for all symbols except Scatter and Double Symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__general014: 236||||The Scatter symbol awards winnings when it appears anywhere in the gameboard.
SECTION__TAGS__wild022: 197||||The Wild x2 symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins008: 107||||During Free Spins all your winnings are tripled.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator002: 202||||After regular payline winnings are counted, the gameboard rotates 90 degrees clockwise, and new payline winnings are counted.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti006: 321||||Level 3 Free Spins will begin only after all Level 2 Free Spins are completed.
SECTION__TAGS__catpot007: 1128||||The winnings obtained from the Catpot feature will be added to the winnings from the spin.
SECTION__TAGS__verticalpaylines001: 213||||The Vertical Multiplying Paylines feature is always active; it does not need to be triggered.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins022: 294||||The number of your current Major Free Spins is always shown in the Free Spin counter, which is displayed during Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedsym003: 187||||This does not include Wild or Scatter symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin011: 307||||Mystery Jackpot can be triggered only in the base game, not during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay015: 88||||If you get 3 or more Wild symbols anywhere during Free Spins, 10 additional 2-Way Pay spins are added to your current 2 Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wild008: 62||||Wild x2 symbols can substitute for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol.
SECTION__TAGS__wild007: 61||||If a win is formed only by Wild x3 symbols, no multiplication will be applied.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym007: 283||||Multiplier x8 symbols appear only on reel number 2.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons005: 16||||Click to access the autoplay settings menu to configure your Autoplay. Select the number of spins or stop Autoplay options.
SECTION__TAGS__permafourwaypay003: 136||||Lines 1-4 pay from left to right, lines 5-8 pay from right to left, lines 9-12 pay from top downwards, and lines 13-16 pay from the bottom upwards.
SECTION__TAGS__fields022: 52||||Displays the possible win amount from winning Gamble.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym008: 195||||Winnings shown in the paytable will be rewarded regardless of the position of the symbols on the active paylines.
SECTION__TAGS__wild034: 244||||The Wild x3 symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__wild043: 416||||The Wild symbol does not have a payout.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins034: 1009||||4 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 10 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__wildreel002: 140||||All the symbols that can appear on reel 4 are Wild symbols except for 1 Scatter symbol.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble011: 117||||You can choose to Gamble after getting 3 or more Scatter symbols but you can not gamble winnings awarded during Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins019: 291||||During Major Free Spins the reels will contain only Major Symbols and Wilds.
SECTION__TAGS__wild006: 60||||Wins obtained on active paylines including any number of Wild x3 symbols are tripled once.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons037: 1091||||Select a number of spins to auto play by the up and down arrows or by selecting a value directly.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons027: 1082||||Click to bet the maximum amount per spin.
SECTION__TAGS__randomwin009: 305||||This feature occurs randomly and can award  20x, 50x or 500x the value of the total bet of the winning spin.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator004: 204||||Both Scatter and Special symbols only award winnings, free spins or rotations once before the Rotator feature is triggered and not again after the rotations have begun.
SECTION__TAGS__general017: 274||||When identical matching symbol appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right, or top to bottom, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym008: 284||||When the Multiplier x8 helps form a win, the payout is the result of this multiplication.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins023: 295||||Major Free Spins cannot be re-triggered during Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__mixnmatch001: 121||||Non-identical symbols can combine in certain orders to form matches.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplierreel005: 1121||||A multiplier is triggered if there is a payline win with 5 matching symbols. This win will be multiplied by the value of the multiplier on the final position of the winning line.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym001: 93||||3 or more Scatter symbols trigger Free Spins when they appear anywhere on the gameboard and activate the Expanding Symbol feature.
SECTION__TAGS__general007: 6||||When identical matching symbols appear consecutively on an active payline from left to right or right to left, you win (see paytable for more details).
SECTION__TAGS__fields026: 194||||Displays the number of active paylines. This can be adjusted by the buttons above and below the field.
SECTION__TAGS__catpot003: 1124||||4 ‘Catpot’ symbols = stake x30 (available in the base game and in Free Spins)
SECTION__TAGS__permafourwaypay002: 135||||Identical matching symbols beginning at any of the four sides of the reels payout winnings.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay024: 254||||If you get 2 Special symbols during 2-Way Pay, 5 additional 2-Way Pay spins will be added to your current 2-Way Pay spins.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti003: 318||||Level 2 Free Spins will begin only after all Level 1 Free Spins are completed.
SECTION__TAGS__wild001: 55||||The Wild symbol substitutes for all other symbols except the Scatter symbol, in terms of payouts or Free Spin triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__levelmulti008: 323||||During Level 3 Free Spins, every time 3 Scatter symbols appear, you win 8 more Free Spins in Level 3. There are no limits to how many times they can be re-triggered in this level.
SECTION__TAGS__wildreel003: 217||||All the symbols that can appear on reel 3 are Wild symbols.
SECTION__TAGS__multipliersym003: 126||||Multiplier x7 symbols appear only on reel number 2.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins001: 100||||3 or more Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 10 Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins007: 106||||During Free Spins all your winnings are doubled.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay026: 279||||For the next 8 spins winnings are counted on active paylines from both left to right, and right to left. Getting matching symbols in a row on an active payline across all reels is counted both ways.
SECTION__TAGS__expandingsym005: 97||||Wins formed of Expanding Symbols will be shown after standard win payouts have been displayed.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons042: 1095||||Click to access the paytable which shows winning combinations and payouts.
SECTION__TAGS__buttons039: 1092||||Press start to start the chosen number of Autospins.
SECTION__TAGS__fields010: 40||||Displays the total bet. The total bet is the result of the amount bet per line multiplied by the quantity of active paylines. This can be adjusted by the buttons on either side of the field.
SECTION__TAGS__catpot005: 1126||||6 ‘Catpot’ symbols = stake x200 (only available in Free Spins)
SECTION__TAGS__freespins003: 102||||During Free Spins, the bet amount and number of active paylines cannot be changed.
SECTION__TAGS__wild035: 245||||The Wild x3 symbol does not substitute for Special symbols, in terms of payouts or 2-Way Pay triggering.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble008: 114||||You can exit the Gamble feature by hitting ‘Collect’ any time to return to the slot.
SECTION__TAGS__gamble006: 176||||The Gamble is always a 50/50 win or lose, and the payout is 100 $PERCENT
SECTION__TAGS__freespins033: 1008||||3 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 5 Major Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__interactingsym002: 119||||Identical Interacting Symbols can form wins by appearing consecutively on active paylines from left to right.
SECTION__TAGS__stackedwilds002: 258||||Wilds with multiplying values can be part of the stack.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins009: 190||||3 Scatter symbols anywhere on the game board trigger 10 Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__general001: 23||||Choose how many paylines you want to activate by adding or subtracting the quantity with buttons aside the ‘lines’ field. You can choose the number of active paylines between a minimum of $LINESTEPS_MIN  and a maximum of $LINESTEPS_MAX.
SECTION__TAGS__twowaypay009: 82||||Getting 3 or more Special symbols anywhere during Free Spins gets you 2-Way Pay for 10 spins only after your Free Spins have ended.
SECTION__TAGS__verticalpaylines005: 278||||Wins obtained on any Vertical Multiplying Payline are multiplied by 3.
SECTION__TAGS__wild019: 72||||Wild symbols substitute for Special symbol payouts, but not for triggering 2-Way Pay.
SECTION__TAGS__freespins004: 103||||If you get 3 or more Scatter symbols during your Free Spins, you get 10 more Free Spins added to your current Free Spins.
SECTION__TAGS__rotator006: 206||||2 Specials triggers 2 rotations. 3 or more Specials triggers 3 rotations.
SECTION__TAGS__multiplyingwilds002: 129||||Wins obtained on active paylines containing one or more Multiplying Wild symbols are multiplied by the Multiplying Wild symbols value.
